archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SWE.5.BP6 Perform software integration test
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Perform the software integration test using the selected test cases. Record the integration test results and logs. NOTE 4: See SUP.9 for handling of non-conformances. NOTE 5: The software integration test may be supported by using hardware debug interfaces or simulation environments (e.g. Software-in-the-LoopSimulation).
